commitMessage:
@@@ISIS-2573: publishing tests: enhanced step tracing

idea is to record all essential execution steps/events.  so that at the
end of the tests.  we can verify that the expected steps had taken place

@@@ISIS-2573: remove TransactionService#nextTransaction()

also fixes most publishing tests
